text: K. S. Sabarinadhan is an Indian politician, engineer, and business executive of the Indian National Congress party. Since 2015, he has been a Member of the Legislative Assembly (M.L.A.) of the Kerala Legislative Assembly, representing the Aruvikkara constituency of the Thiruvananthapuram district in the state of Kerala. ==Personal life== On 2 May 2017, he announced his engagement to Thiruvananthapuram sub-collector Divya S. Iyer.http://kaumudiglobal.com/innerpage1.php?newsid=90909 On 30 June 2017, he married Iyer in Kumarakovil, a temple at Thuckalay in Kanyakumari district, becoming the first MLA-IAS couple in Kerala.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/thiruvananthapuram/congress- mla-ks-sabarinadhan-marries-kerala-ias-officer/articleshow/59381651.cms ==Kerala Legislative Assembly By-election, 2015== He was elected to the Kerala Legislative Assembly in the 2015 By-elections from Aruvikkara constituency with 56,448 votes and a margin of 10,128 Votes, defeating M. Vijayakumar (CPI-M) and O. Rajagopal (BJP). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Kerala Category:Kerala MLAs 2011–2016 Category:Kerala MLAs 2016– Category:1983 births
title: K. S. Sabarinathan
